title: Oct2

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Target a player. You will deal an Unstoppable attack to them and gain 1 soul. You will leave behind a dead body that appears to be alive. It will only appear as dead the day after.
- Place a bet on someone during the day. If they get lynched, gain 2 souls.
- Gain powerful defense for the night. If you succesfully protect yourself from an Attack, gain 2 souls. Cost: 1 soul
- Guess someone's role. If you're correct, gain 2 souls. If you're wrong, remove 2 souls. Cost: 1 soul
- Deal an Unstoppable Rampage Attack to up to 3 players. Gain 4 souls if the amount of people you killed Is 3, 2 souls If It Is between 4 and 6, and 1 soul if its 7 or higher. Cost: 6 souls.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill the Town and anyone that may oppose you

desc:
Post 8
*Me when i watch a funny cat video*
